Articles.Content:
Did anyone manage to find out, how to replicate those buttons, displayed in the right bottom corner, on top of the kerbal pics?

Is the IVA a vessel change? and how to get the guy to EVA..

I'd appreciate any hints..

Edit:

solved


                ProtoCrewMember pcm;
                if (GUILayout.Button("Send on EVA"))
                {
                    FlightEVA.SpawnEVA(pcm.seat.kerbalRef);
                }

or



                    InternalSeat iS;

                    if (GUILayout.Button("Send on EVA"))
                    {
                        FlightEVA.SpawnEVA(iS.kerbalRef);
                    }

Edited January 29, 2015 by philotical
